pygwb.delta_sigma_cut.calc_Hf

pygwb.delta_sigma_cut.calc_Hf(freqs: numpy.ndarray, alpha: float = 0, fref: int = 20)[source]

Function that calculates the H(f) power law

Parameters
freqs: array

An array of frequencies from an FFT

alpha: float

spectral index

fref: int

reference frequency

Returns
H(f): array

H(f) power law frequencies weighted by alpha
